name: Skip (Shawn Huang Fernandes)
description:
Help Buford skip his way across the sea!
This timing based endless runner was made in 3 days for Mini Jam 108.

Theme: Seaside

Constraint: Everything dies in one hit

Team:

Joseph Crump - Design/Programming/Art

Santi Soza - Music Composition and Sound Design

Shawn Huang Fernandes - Design/Programming/Art
